properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station...
properties.longDescription: This charming family home offers spacious living areas and is ideally located for commuters. It features a fitted kitchen/breakfast room, a conservatory, and a utility room. The first floor hosts three bedrooms and a family bathroom. The property is double glazed with gas central heating throughout.
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington

properties.description: Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat...
properties.longDescription: A modern garden flat boasting an open-plan living room and kitchen with integrated appliances. Bi-folding doors lead to a private courtyard. Features include solid wooden floors, walnut doors, and a separate wet room. Still under a 10-year building guarantee.

properties.description: Stunning 5-bedroom detached luxury villa in the heart of NW1...
properties.longDescription: A substantial detached residence featuring five en-suite bedrooms, a private cinema room, and a landscaped garden. The interior utilizes Italian marble and smart home automation throughout for a truly luxury experience.

properties.description: Modern 1-bedroom apartment perfect for first-time buyers...
properties.longDescription: Chic third-floor apartment with floor-to-ceiling windows. Located in a vibrant area with excellent transport links to London Victoria via Bromley South station.

properties.description: Beautiful 4-bedroom Edwardian terrace with original features...
properties.longDescription: Combines period charm with modern convenience. Features original fireplaces, high ceilings, and a large farmhouse kitchen. Situated in a prestigious school catchment area.

properties.description: Spacious 3-bedroom penthouse with panoramic city views...
properties.longDescription: Exquisite penthouse with an expansive roof terrace. Boasts underfloor heating, open-plan living, and 24-hour concierge service in a gated development.

properties.description: Charming 2-bedroom cottage in a quiet residential cul-de-sac...
properties.longDescription: Quaint cottage offering two cozy bedrooms and a refurbished kitchen. Tucked away in a peaceful area while remaining close to the heart of Camden Town.
